message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product for $11,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer. I'm interested but $11,000 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider $9,000?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit, how about $10,250?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  $10,250 is closer, but I'm aiming for something closer to $9,500.
